## Geo Data for Human Wellbeing

### Introducing PRIO-GRID version 3

Aimed at the Nature Scientific Data, special issue on Geo Data for Human Wellbeing.

### Replication of Ide et al. (2014)

#### Setting up PRIO-GRID

```{r}

library(priogrid)

```

```{r}

# pgoptions$set_rawfolder("/filepath/to/rawfolder")

pgoptions$set_extent(c(xmin = 30, xmax = 42, ymin = -5, ymax = 5))

pgoptions$set_start_date("1990-01-01")

pgoptions$set_end_date("2025-01-01")

```

#### Load data from PRIO-GRID

```{r}

pre <- read_cru_pre()


```
